element.name: cutaneous nerve of thigh, lateral
element.distribution: skin of lateral and frontal aspects of thigh

element.name: ilioinguinal nerve
element.origin: lumbar PLEXUS L1 (sometimes T12); accompanies the spermatic cord through the inguinal canal
element.distribution: skin of scrotum or labia majora, and adjacent part of thigh

element.name: labial nerves, anterior
element.distribution: skin of anterior labial region of labia majora, and adjacent part of thigh
